constraints_details.constraints_layer_description: KEYACH Name: Hogsmill Valley Key Area of Change
AIRCZ Type:: Gatwick Airport Wind Turbine Consultation Zone:Contact: The Safeguarding Department, Gatwick Airport Limited, 7th Floor Destinations Place, London Gatwick Airport, West Sussex, RH06 0NP

AIRCZ Type:: Heathrow Planning Consultation Zone: All buildings, structures, erections and works exceeding 90 metres in height (295.3 feet)Contact: The Safeguarding Department, Heathrow Airport Limited, c/o Planning Services, First Point, Buckingham Gate, Gatwick Airport, West Sussex, RH6 0NT

description: Details of reserved matters pursuant to Condition 1 (Access and Landscaping), Condition 5 (Materials), Condition 6 (Levels), Condition 7 (Refuse Storage), Condition 9 (Construction Method Statement), Condition 11 (SUDS)  of Outline application 19/01716/OUT (Allowed on Appeal APP/Z5630/W/19/3241782) (Demolition of existing dwellinghouse and erection of new 3 storey residential building, plus basement to create x 8 flats with associated landscaping, bins and cycle store (outline application to consider appearance, layout and scale only).) .
decision_conditions: Based on the description stated on the application form and the details accompanied with the application, the applicant appears to have conflated the reserved matters application with a details pursuant to application.  The application seeks to deal with matters that fall outside of the remit of a reserved matters application, thereby conflicting with the Town and Country Planning (Development Management Procedure) (England) Order 2015 (as amended).
The declaration section in the submitted appliction form is signed by a different person, please amend the application form with the correct names.
